//instructions using LDUR and STUR- You may have to inserted NOPs to get the required result
0000000000000000 001F03FF //NOP
0000000000000001 00A00045 //LDUR X5, [X2,#0]
0000000000000002 00A02026 //LDUR X6, [X1,#2]
0000000000000003 001F03FF //NOP
0000000000000004 001F03FF //NOP
0000000000000005 000600A5 //ADD X5, X5, X6
0000000000000006 001F03FF //NOP
0000000000000007 00C02045 //STUR X5, [X2,#2]
0000000000000008 001F03FF //NOP
